disburse(uint256).details: This function can only be called by governance or an authorized entity.

params.amount: The amount of coins to disburse.

disburse(uint256,address).details: This function can only be called by governance or an authorized entity.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to disburse.
params.currency: The address of the ERC20 token to disburse tokens.

disburse(uint256).notice: Disburses funds from the contract to a specified address.

disburse(uint256,address).notice: Disburses funds from the contract to a specified address.
